Package edu.kit.kastel.mcse.ardoco.core.common.util

Class CommonUtilities

java.lang.Object
edu.kit.kastel.mcse.ardoco.core.common.util.CommonUtilities
public final class CommonUtilities extends Object
General helper class for outsourced, common methods.

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • containsSeparator

      Checks if a string contains any separators.
      Parameters:

    • addRecommendedInstancesFromNounMappings

      public static void addRecommendedInstancesFromNounMappings(org.eclipse.collections.api.list.ImmutableList<String> similarTypes, org.eclipse.collections.api.list.ImmutableList<NounMapping> nameMappings, org.eclipse.collections.api.list.ImmutableList<NounMapping> typeMappings, RecommendationState recommendationState, Claimant claimant, double probability)
      Creates RecommendedInstances for the given NounMappings using the given information about similar types and probability and type mappings. Adds the created RecommendedInstances to the given RecommendationState
      Parameters:
      similarTypes - The list of similar types
      nameMappings - the noun mappings
      typeMappings - the type mappings
      recommendationState - the state the new RecommendedInstances should be added to
      probability - the probability that should be annotated

    • getSimilarTypes

      public static org.eclipse.collections.api.list.ImmutableList<String> getSimilarTypes(Word word, ModelExtractionState modelState)
      Retrieves a list of similar types in the given model state given the word.
      Parameters:
      word - the word that might have type names in the model state
      modelState - the model state containing information about types
      Returns:
      List of type names in the model state that are similar to the given word

    • getTypeIdentifiers

      public static Set<String> getTypeIdentifiers(ModelExtractionState modelState)
      Returns a set of identifiers for the types in the model state.
      Parameters:
      modelState - the model state
      Returns:
      Set of identifiers for existing types

    • splitSnakeAndKebabCase

      public static String splitSnakeAndKebabCase(String name)
      Splits a given String at Snake and Kebab cases. For example, "test-string" and "test_string" become "test string".
      Parameters:
      name - the given name
      Returns:
      the name split at snake and kebab case

    • splitCamelCase

      public static String splitCamelCase(String name)
      Splits a given String at camel cases. For example, "testString" becomes "test String".
      Parameters:
      name - the given name
      Returns:
      the name split at camel case

    • splitCases

      public static String splitCases(String name)
      Splits a given String using splitCamelCase(String) and splitSnakeAndKebabCase(String)
      Parameters:
      name - the given name
      Returns:
      the split name

    • nameIsCamelCased

      public static boolean nameIsCamelCased(String name)
      Checks if the given name is a CamelCased-word
      Parameters:
      name - the name to check
      Returns:
      true if the given name is CamelCased

    • nameIsSnakeCased

      Checks if the given name is a snake_cased-word
      Parameters:
      name - the name to check
      Returns:
      true if the given name is snake_cased

      Parameters:
      name - the name to check
      Returns:
      true if the given name is kebab-cased

    • createReferenceForCompound

      public static String createReferenceForCompound(org.eclipse.collections.api.list.ImmutableList<Word> compoundWords)
      Creates a reference given a list of words (compoundWords)
      Parameters:
      compoundWords - the given compoundWords
      Returns:
      a reference that consists of the words in the given compoundWords

    • getCompoundWords

      public static org.eclipse.collections.api.list.ImmutableList<Word> getCompoundWords(Word word)

    • isCamelCasedWord

      public static boolean isCamelCasedWord(String word)
      Check if the word is CamelCased. Additionally, the word needs to have a length > 4, otherwise it is probably only a abbreviation.
      Parameters:
      word - Word to check
      Returns:
      true if the word is CamelCased and has a length greater than 4

    • wordListContainsAnyWordFromRecommendedInstance

      public static boolean wordListContainsAnyWordFromRecommendedInstance(org.eclipse.collections.api.list.ImmutableList<Word> wordList, RecommendedInstance recommendedInstance)
      Checks a given list of words to find out if there are words that the given recommendedInstance has in its NounMappings.
      Parameters:
      wordList - the word list to check
      recommendedInstance - the RecommendedInstance in question
      Returns:
      true if at least one word is also covered by the RecommendedInstance, else false

      public static String getCurrentTimeAsString()
